subMembers.name: Configuration
subMembers.description: An object defining configuration properties for the UI component.

subMembers.name: adaptivityEnabled
subMembers.description: Specifies whether the UI component adapts to small screens.

subMembers.name: allDayExpr
subMembers.description: Specifies the name of the data source item field whose value defines whether or not the corresponding appointment is an all-day appointment.

subMembers.name: allDayPanelMode
subMembers.description: Specifies the display mode for the **All day** panel.

subMembers.name: appointmentCollectorComponent
subMembers.description: An alias for the [appointmentCollectorTemplate] property specified in React. Accepts a custom component. Refer to [Using a Custom Component] for more information.

subMembers.name: appointmentCollectorRender
subMembers.description: An alias for the [appointmentCollectorTemplate] property specified in React. Accepts a rendering function. Refer to [Using a Rendering Function] for more information.

subMembers.name: appointmentCollectorTemplate
subMembers.description: Specifies a custom template for [cell overflow indicators].

subMembers.name: appointmentComponent
subMembers.description: An alias for the [appointmentTemplate] property specified in React. Accepts a custom component. Refer to [Using a Custom Component] for more information.

subMembers.name: appointmentDragging
subMembers.description: Configures appointment reordering using drag and drop gestures.

subMembers.name: autoScroll
subMembers.description: Enables automatic scrolling while dragging an appointment beyond the viewport.

subMembers.name: data
subMembers.description: A container for custom data.

subMembers.name: group
subMembers.description: Allows you to group several UI components so that users can drag and drop appointments between them.

subMembers.name: scrollSensitivity
subMembers.description: Specifies the distance in pixels from the edge of viewport at which scrolling should start. Applies only if [autoScroll] is **true**.

subMembers.name: scrollSpeed
subMembers.description: Specifies the scrolling speed when dragging an appointment beyond the viewport. Applies only if [autoScroll] is **true**.

subMembers.name: appointmentPopupComponent
subMembers.description: An alias for the [appointmentPopupTemplate] property specified in React. Accepts a custom component. Refer to [Using a Custom Component] for more information.

subMembers.name: appointmentPopupRender
subMembers.description: An alias for the [appointmentPopupTemplate] property specified in React. Accepts a rendering function. Refer to [Using a Rendering Function] for more information.

subMembers.name: appointmentPopupTemplate
subMembers.description: The template to be used for rendering an appointment details popup.

subMembers.name: appointmentRender
subMembers.description: An alias for the [appointmentTemplate] property specified in React. Accepts a rendering function. Refer to [Using a Rendering Function] for more information.

subMembers.name: appointmentTemplate
subMembers.description: Specifies a custom template for appointments.

subMembers.name: appointmentTooltipComponent
subMembers.description: An alias for the [appointmentTooltipTemplate] property specified in React. Accepts a custom component. Refer to [Using a Custom Component] for more information.

subMembers.name: appointmentTooltipRender
subMembers.description: An alias for the [appointmentTooltipTemplate] property specified in React. Accepts a rendering function. Refer to [Using a Rendering Function] for more information.

subMembers.name: appointmentTooltipTemplate
subMembers.description: Specifies a custom template for tooltips displayed when users click an appointment or [cell overflow indicator].

subMembers.name: cellDuration
subMembers.description: Specifies cell duration in minutes. This property's value should divide the interval between [startDayHour] and [endDayHour] into even parts.

subMembers.name: crossScrollingEnabled
subMembers.description: Specifies whether or not an end user can scroll the view in both directions at the same time.

subMembers.name: currentDate
subMembers.description: Specifies the current date.

subMembers.name: currentView
subMembers.description: Specifies the displayed view. Accepts [name] or [type] of a view available in the [views] array.

subMembers.name: customizeDateNavigatorText
subMembers.description: Customizes the date navigator's text.

subMembers.name: dataCellComponent
subMembers.description: An alias for the [dataCellTemplate] property specified in React. Accepts a custom component. Refer to [Using a Custom Component] for more information.

subMembers.name: dataCellRender
subMembers.description: An alias for the [dataCellTemplate] property specified in React. Accepts a rendering function. Refer to [Using a Rendering Function] for more information.

subMembers.name: dataCellTemplate
subMembers.description: Specifies a custom template for table cells.

subMembers.name: dataSource
subMembers.type: String | Array<dxSchedulerAppointment> | Store | DataSource | DataSource_Options | null
subMembers.description: Binds the UI component to data.

subMembers.name: dateCellComponent
subMembers.description: An alias for the [dateCellTemplate] property specified in React. Accepts a custom component. Refer to [Using a Custom Component] for more information.

subMembers.name: dateCellRender
subMembers.description: An alias for the [dateCellTemplate] property specified in React. Accepts a rendering function. Refer to [Using a Rendering Function] for more information.

subMembers.name: dateCellTemplate
subMembers.description: Specifies a custom template for day scale items.

subMembers.name: dateSerializationFormat
subMembers.description: <!-- %shortDescription% -->

subMembers.name: descriptionExpr
subMembers.description: Specifies the name of the data source item field whose value holds the description of the corresponding appointment.

subMembers.name: dropDownAppointmentComponent
subMembers.description: An alias for the [dropDownAppointmentTemplate] property specified in React. Accepts a custom component. Refer to [Using a Custom Component] for more information.

subMembers.name: dropDownAppointmentRender
subMembers.description: An alias for the [dropDownAppointmentTemplate] property specified in React. Accepts a rendering function. Refer to [Using a Rendering Function] for more information.

subMembers.name: dropDownAppointmentTemplate
subMembers.description: Specifies a custom template for tooltips displayed when users click a [cell overflow indicator].

subMembers.name: allowAdding
subMembers.description: Specifies whether or not an end user can add appointments.

subMembers.name: allowDeleting
subMembers.description: Specifies whether or not an end user can delete appointments.

subMembers.name: allowDragging
subMembers.description: Specifies whether users can drag and drop appointments.

subMembers.name: allowResizing
subMembers.description: Specifies whether or not an end user can change an appointment duration.

subMembers.name: allowTimeZoneEditing
subMembers.description: Specifies whether users can edit appointment time zones.

subMembers.name: allowUpdating
subMembers.description: Specifies whether or not an end user can change appointment properties.

subMembers.name: editing
subMembers.description: Specifies which editing operations a user can perform on appointments.

subMembers.name: endDateExpr
subMembers.description: Specifies the name of the data source item field that defines the ending of an appointment.

subMembers.name: endDateTimeZoneExpr
subMembers.description: Specifies the name of the data source item field that defines the timezone of the appointment end date.

subMembers.name: endDayHour
subMembers.description: Specifies the last hour on the time scale. Accepts integer values from 0 to 24.

subMembers.name: firstDayOfWeek
subMembers.description: Specifies the first day of a week. Does not apply to the [agenda view].

subMembers.name: groupByDate
subMembers.description: If **true**, appointments are grouped by date first and then by resource; opposite if **false**. Applies only if appointments are [grouped] and [groupOrientation] is *"horizontal"*.

subMembers.name: groups
subMembers.description: Specifies the [resource kinds] by which the scheduler's appointments are grouped in a timetable.

subMembers.name: indicatorUpdateInterval
subMembers.description: Specifies the time interval between when the [date-time indicator] changes its position, in milliseconds.

subMembers.name: max
subMembers.description: The latest date the UI component allows you to select.

subMembers.name: maxAppointmentsPerCell
subMembers.description: Specifies the limit of full-sized appointments displayed per cell. Applies to all views except *"agenda"*.

subMembers.name: min
subMembers.description: The earliest date the UI component allows you to select.

subMembers.name: noDataText
subMembers.description: Specifies the text or HTML markup displayed by the UI component if the item collection is empty. Available for the Agenda [view] only.

subMembers.name: offset
subMembers.description: Specifies the minute offset within Scheduler indicating the starting point of a day.

subMembers.name: recurrenceEditMode
subMembers.description: Specifies the edit mode for recurring appointments.

subMembers.name: recurrenceExceptionExpr
subMembers.description: Specifies the name of the data source item field that defines exceptions for the current recurring appointment.

subMembers.name: recurrenceRuleExpr
subMembers.description: Specifies the name of the data source item field that defines a recurrence rule for generating recurring appointments.

subMembers.name: remoteFiltering
subMembers.description: Specifies whether filtering is performed on the server or client side.

subMembers.name: resourceCellComponent
subMembers.description: An alias for the [resourceCellTemplate] property specified in React. Accepts a custom component. Refer to [Using a Custom Component] for more information.

subMembers.name: resourceCellRender
subMembers.description: An alias for the [resourceCellTemplate] property specified in React. Accepts a rendering function. Refer to [Using a Rendering Function] for more information.

subMembers.name: resourceCellTemplate
subMembers.description: Specifies a custom template for resource headers.

subMembers.name: allowMultiple
subMembers.description: Specifies whether you can assign several resources of this kind to an appointment.

subMembers.name: colorExpr
subMembers.description: Specifies the [resource object] field that is used as a resource color.

subMembers.name: dataSource
subMembers.type: Store | DataSource | DataSource_Options | String | Array<any> | null
subMembers.description: Specifies available resource instances.

subMembers.name: displayExpr
subMembers.description: Specifies which field from the [resource data objects] provides values to be displayed in the resource editor.

subMembers.name: fieldExpr
subMembers.description: The name of the appointment object field that specifies a resource of this kind.

subMembers.name: label
subMembers.description: Specifies the label of the Appointment popup window field that allows end users to assign a resource of this kind.

subMembers.name: resources
subMembers.description: Specifies an array of resources available in the scheduler.

subMembers.name: useColorAsDefault
subMembers.description: Specifies whether appointments are colored like this resource kind.

subMembers.name: valueExpr
subMembers.description: Specifies the [resource object] field that is used as a value of the Resource editor in the Appointment popup window.

subMembers.name: scrolling
subMembers.description: Configures scrolling.

subMembers.name: selectedCellData
subMembers.description: The data of the currently selected cells.

subMembers.name: shadeUntilCurrentTime
subMembers.description: Specifies whether to apply shading to cover the timetable up to the current time.

subMembers.name: showAllDayPanel
subMembers.description: Specifies the "All-day" panel's visibility. Setting this property to **false** hides the panel along with the all-day appointments.

subMembers.name: showCurrentTimeIndicator
subMembers.description: Specifies the current date-time indicator's visibility.

subMembers.name: startDateExpr
subMembers.description: Specifies the name of the data source item field that defines the start of an appointment.

subMembers.name: startDateTimeZoneExpr
subMembers.description: Specifies the name of the data source item field that defines the timezone of the appointment start date.

subMembers.name: startDayHour
subMembers.description: Specifies the first hour on the time scale. Accepts integer values from 0 to 24.

subMembers.name: textExpr
subMembers.description: Specifies the name of the data source item field that holds the subject of an appointment.

subMembers.name: timeCellComponent
subMembers.description: An alias for the [timeCellTemplate] property specified in React. Accepts a custom component. Refer to [Using a Custom Component] for more information.

subMembers.name: timeCellRender
subMembers.description: An alias for the [timeCellTemplate] property specified in React. Accepts a rendering function. Refer to [Using a Rendering Function] for more information.

subMembers.name: timeCellTemplate
subMembers.description: Specifies a custom template for time scale items.

subMembers.name: timeZone
subMembers.description: Specifies the time zone for the Scheduler's grid. Accepts values from the IANA time zone database.

subMembers.name: toolbar
subMembers.description: Configures the toolbar.

subMembers.name: useDropDownViewSwitcher
subMembers.description: Specifies whether a user can switch views using tabs or a drop-down menu.

subMembers.name: agendaDuration
subMembers.description: Specifies the number of dates that can be shown at a time in the [agenda view].

subMembers.name: allDayPanelMode
subMembers.description: Specifies the display mode for the **All day** panel.

subMembers.name: appointmentCollectorComponent
subMembers.description: An alias for the [appointmentCollectorTemplate] property specified in React. Accepts a custom component. Refer to [Using a Custom Component] for more information.

subMembers.name: appointmentCollectorRender
subMembers.description: An alias for the [appointmentCollectorTemplate] property specified in React. Accepts a rendering function. Refer to [Using a Rendering Function] for more information.

subMembers.name: appointmentCollectorTemplate
subMembers.description: Specifies a custom template for [cell overflow indicators] in this view.

subMembers.name: appointmentTooltipRender
subMembers.description: An alias for the [appointmentTooltipTemplate] property specified in React. Accepts a rendering function. Refer to [Using a Rendering Function] for more information.

subMembers.name: appointmentTooltipTemplate
subMembers.description: Specifies a custom template for tooltips displayed when users click an appointment or [cell overflow indicator] in this view.

subMembers.name: cellDuration
subMembers.description: The cell duration in minutes.

subMembers.description: An alias for the [dataCellTemplate] property specified in React. Accepts a custom component. Refer to [Using a Custom Component] for more information.

subMembers.description: An alias for the [dataCellTemplate] property specified in React. Accepts a rendering function. Refer to [Using a Rendering Function] for more information.

subMembers.description: Specifies a custom template for table cells.

subMembers.name: dateCellComponent
subMembers.description: An alias for the [dateCellTemplate] property specified in React. Accepts a custom component. Refer to [Using a Custom Component] for more information.

subMembers.name: dateCellRender
subMembers.description: An alias for the [dateCellTemplate] property specified in React. Accepts a rendering function. Refer to [Using a Rendering Function] for more information.

subMembers.name: dateCellTemplate
subMembers.description: Specifies a custom template for date scale items.

subMembers.name: dropDownAppointmentComponent
subMembers.description: An alias for the [dropDownAppointmentTemplate] property specified in React. Accepts a custom component. Refer to [Using a Custom Component] for more information.

subMembers.name: dropDownAppointmentRender
subMembers.description: An alias for the [dropDownAppointmentTemplate] property specified in React. Accepts a rendering function. Refer to [Using a Rendering Function] for more information.

subMembers.name: dropDownAppointmentTemplate
subMembers.description: Specifies a custom template for tooltips displayed when users click a [cell overflow indicator] in this view.

subMembers.name: endDayHour
subMembers.description: Specifies the last hour on the view's time scale. Accepts integer values from 0 to 24.

subMembers.name: firstDayOfWeek
subMembers.description: The first day of a week. Does not apply to the [agenda view].

subMembers.name: groupByDate
subMembers.description: If **true**, appointments are grouped by date first and then by resource; opposite if **false**. Applies only if appointments are [grouped] and [groupOrientation] is *"horizontal"*.

subMembers.name: groupOrientation
subMembers.description: Arranges resource headers vertically (in a column) or horizontally (in a row).

subMembers.name: groups
subMembers.description: The resource kinds by which appointments are grouped.

subMembers.name: intervalCount
subMembers.description: Multiplies the default view interval. Applies to all [view types] except *"agenda"*.

subMembers.name: maxAppointmentsPerCell
subMembers.description: Specifies the limit of full-sized appointments displayed per cell. Applies to all views except *"agenda"*.

subMembers.name: name
subMembers.description: A custom view name displayed in the [view switcher].

subMembers.name: offset
subMembers.description: Specifies the minute offset within the view indicating the starting point of a day.

subMembers.name: resourceCellComponent
subMembers.description: An alias for the [resourceCellTemplate] property specified in React. Accepts a custom component. Refer to [Using a Custom Component] for more information.

subMembers.name: resourceCellRender
subMembers.description: An alias for the [resourceCellTemplate] property specified in React. Accepts a rendering function. Refer to [Using a Rendering Function] for more information.

subMembers.name: resourceCellTemplate
subMembers.description: Specifies a custom template for resource headers.

subMembers.name: scrolling
subMembers.description: Configures scrolling for a view.

subMembers.name: startDate
subMembers.description: Specifies the date from which to start counting the [view interval]. Applies to all [view types] except *"agenda"*.

subMembers.name: startDayHour
subMembers.description: Specifies the first hour on the view's time scale. Accepts integer values from 0 to 24.

subMembers.name: timeCellComponent
subMembers.description: An alias for the [timeCellTemplate] property specified in React. Accepts a custom component. Refer to [Using a Custom Component] for more information.

subMembers.name: timeCellRender
subMembers.description: An alias for the [timeCellTemplate] property specified in React. Accepts a rendering function. Refer to [Using a Rendering Function] for more information.

subMembers.name: timeCellTemplate
subMembers.description: Specifies a custom template for time scale items.

subMembers.name: type
subMembers.description: The type of the view.

subMembers.name: views
subMembers.description: Specifies and configures the [views] to be available in the [view switcher].

subMembers.name: Interfaces
subMembers.description: This section describes interfaces that the {WidgetName} component uses.

subMembers.name: SchedulerTimeZone
subMembers.description: A time zone object.

subMembers.name: id
subMembers.description: A time zone text string from the IANA database.

subMembers.name: offset
subMembers.description: A GMT offset.

subMembers.name: title
subMembers.description: A time zone in the following format: `(GMT ±[hh]:[mm]) [id]`.

subMembers.name: allDay
subMembers.description: Specifies whether the appointment lasts all day.

subMembers.name: component
subMembers.description: An alias for the [template] property specified in React. Accepts a custom component. Refer to [Using a Custom Component] for more information.

subMembers.name: description
subMembers.description: Specifies a detail description of the appointment.

subMembers.name: disabled
subMembers.description: Specifies whether the appointment responds to user interaction.

subMembers.name: dxSchedulerAppointment
subMembers.description: An object that describes an appointment in the [Scheduler] UI component.

subMembers.name: endDate
subMembers.description: Specifies the ending of the appointment.

subMembers.name: endDateTimeZone
subMembers.description: Specifies the time zone for an appointment's [endDate]. Accepts values from the IANA time zone database.

subMembers.name: html
subMembers.description: Specifies the HTML markup to be inserted into the appointment element.

subMembers.name: recurrenceException
subMembers.description: Specifies the start date and time of one or more appointments to exclude from a series. This property requires that you also set [recurrenceRule].

subMembers.name: recurrenceRule
subMembers.description: Specifies a recurrence rule based on which the Scheduler generates an appointment series.

subMembers.name: render
subMembers.description: An alias for the [template] property specified in React. Accepts a rendering function. Refer to [Using a Rendering Function] for more information.

subMembers.name: startDate
subMembers.description: Specifies the start of the appointment.

subMembers.name: startDateTimeZone
subMembers.description: Specifies the time zone for an appointment's [startDate]. Accepts values from the IANA time zone database.

subMembers.name: template
subMembers.description: Specifies a template that should be used to render this appointment only.

subMembers.name: text
subMembers.description: Specifies the subject of the appointment.

subMembers.name: visible
subMembers.description: Specifies whether or not an appointment must be displayed.

subMembers.name: disabled
subMembers.description: Specifies whether the toolbar responds to user interaction.

subMembers.name: dxSchedulerToolbar
subMembers.description: Configures the toolbar.

subMembers.name: items
subMembers.description: <!-- %shortDescription% -->

subMembers.name: multiline
subMembers.description: Specifies whether the toolbar arranges items into multiple lines when their combined width exceeds the toolbar width.

subMembers.name: visible
subMembers.description: Specifies whether the toolbar is visible.

subMembers.name: dxSchedulerToolbarItem
subMembers.description: Configures toolbar items.

subMembers.name: location
subMembers.description: Specifies toolbar item location.

subMembers.name: name
subMembers.description: Specifies the name of the predefined toolbar item.

subMembers.name: options
subMembers.description: Configures the DevExtreme UI component used as a toolbar item.

properties.name: dxScheduler
properties.description: The Scheduler is a UI component that represents scheduled data and allows a user to manage and edit it.

Methods.name: deleteAppointment(appointment)
Methods.description: Deletes an appointment from the timetable and its object from the data source.

Methods.name: getEndViewDate()
Methods.description: Gets the current view's end date.

Methods.name: getStartViewDate()
Methods.description: Gets the current view's start date.

Methods.name: hideAppointmentTooltip()
Methods.description: Hides an appointment's or [cell overflow indicator]'s tooltip.

Methods.name: scrollTo(date_group_allDay)
Methods.description: Scrolls the current view to a specified position. Available for all views except *"agenda"*. You should specify the [height] property to use this method.

Methods.name: scrollToTime(hours_minutes_date)
Methods.description: Scrolls the current view to a specific day and time.

Methods.name: showAppointmentTooltip(appointmentData_target_currentAppointmentData)
Methods.description: Shows a tooltip for a target element.

Events.name: onAdd
Events.description: A function that is called when a new appointment is added.

Events.name: onDragEnd
Events.description: A function that is called when the dragged appointment's position is changed.

Events.name: onDragMove
Events.description: A function that is called every time a draggable appointment is moved.

Events.name: onDragStart
Events.description: A function that is called when the drag gesture is initialized.

Events.name: onRemove
Events.description: A function that is called when a draggable appointment is removed.

Events.name: onAppointmentAdded
Events.description: A function that is executed after an appointment is added to the data source.

Events.name: onAppointmentAdding
Events.description: A function that is executed before an appointment is added to the data source.

Events.name: onAppointmentClick
Events.description: A function that is executed when an appointment is clicked or tapped.

Events.name: onAppointmentContextMenu
Events.description: A function that is executed when a user attempts to open the browser's context menu for an appointment. Allows you to replace this context menu with a custom context menu.

Events.name: onAppointmentDblClick
Events.description: A function that is executed when an appointment is double-clicked or double-tapped.

Events.name: onAppointmentDeleted
Events.description: A function that is executed after an appointment is deleted from the data source.

Events.name: onAppointmentDeleting
Events.description: A function that is executed before an appointment is deleted from the data source.

Events.name: onAppointmentFormOpening
Events.description: A function that is executed before an appointment details form appears. Use this function to customize the form.

Events.name: onAppointmentRendered
Events.description: A function that is executed when an appointment is rendered.

Events.name: onAppointmentTooltipShowing
Events.description: Occurs before showing an appointment's tooltip.

Events.name: onAppointmentUpdated
Events.description: A function that is executed after an appointment is updated in the data source.

Events.name: onAppointmentUpdating
Events.description: A function that is executed before an appointment is updated in the data source.

Events.name: onCellClick
Events.description: A function that is executed when a view cell is clicked.

Events.name: onCellContextMenu
Events.description: A function that is executed when a user attempts to open the browser's context menu for a cell. Allows you to replace this context menu with a custom context menu.

Events.name: onContentReady
Events.description: A function that is executed when the UI component is rendered and each time the component is repainted.

Events.name: onDisposing
Events.description: A function that is executed before the UI component is [disposed of].md '{basewidgetpath}/Methods/#dispose').

Events.name: onInitialized
Events.description: A function used in JavaScript frameworks to save the UI component instance.

Events.name: onOptionChanged
Events.description: A function that is executed after a UI component property is changed.

Events.name: appointmentAdded
Events.description: Raised after an appointment is added to the data source.

Events.name: appointmentAdding
Events.description: Raised before an appointment is added to the data source.

Events.name: appointmentClick
Events.description: Raised when an appointment is clicked or tapped.

Events.name: appointmentContextMenu
Events.description: Raised when a user attempts to open the browser's context menu for an appointment.

Events.name: appointmentDblClick
Events.description: Raised when an appointment is double-clicked or double-tapped.

Events.name: appointmentDeleted
Events.description: Raised after an appointment is deleted from the data source.

Events.name: appointmentDeleting
Events.description: Raised before an appointment is deleted from the data source.

Events.name: appointmentFormOpening
Events.description: Raised before an appointment details form is opened.

Events.name: appointmentRendered
Events.description: Raised when an appointment is rendered.

Events.name: appointmentTooltipShowing
Events.description: Fires before showing an appointment's tooltip.

Events.name: appointmentUpdated
Events.description: Raised after an appointment is updated in the data source.

Events.name: appointmentUpdating
Events.description: Raised before an appointment is updated in the data source.

Events.name: cellClick
Events.description: Raised when a view cell is clicked.

Events.name: cellContextMenu
Events.description: Raised when a user attempts to open the browser's context menu for a cell.

Types.name: AllDayPanelMode
Types.description: Specifies the display mode for the **All day** panel.

Types.name: CellAppointmentsLimit
Types.description: Specifies the limit of full-sized appointments displayed per cell. Applies to all views except *"agenda"*.

subMembers.name: CellClickEvent
subMembers.description: The type of the [cellClick] event handler's argument.

subMembers.name: CellContextMenuEvent
subMembers.description: The type of the [cellContextMenu] event handler's argument.

Types.name: ContentReadyEvent
Types.description: The type of the [contentReady] event handler's argument.

Types.description: The type of the [optionChanged] event handler's argument.

Types.name: RecurrenceEditMode
Types.description: Specifies the edit mode for recurring appointments.

Types.name: SchedulerPredefinedDateNavigatorItem
Types.description: Specifies names for date navigator parts.

Types.name: SchedulerPredefinedToolbarItem
Types.description: Specifies predefined items for the Scheduler toolbar.
